content: A unit of industrial manufacturing conglomerate Dover Corp did not violate labor law by issuing a warning to a worker  an appeals court ruled Tuesday in a decision reversing the National Labor Relations Board.
name: Dover Corporation
title: Dover Corp's warning to worker did not violate labor law - D.C. Circuit

content: Sept 7 U.S. industrial conglomerate Dover Corp  said Monday it has agreed to buy part of French petrol station equipment provider Tokheim Group's businesses for 425 million euros ($473.58 million) to expand its fluids division.
name: Dover Corporation
title: Dover to buy Tokheim's fuel dispenser unit for 425 mln euros
